More and more train vehicles are requested to have a compact design and lightweight structure. Our combined solutions help customers reach this goal. Examples of combined solutions can be Auxiliary Transformers with an Integrated Inductor or Multifunctional units composed of a single enclosure including different kinds of Inductors (e.g., Line Filter, DC Chopper, and 3ph auxiliary filter).

Quality is a priority for Hitachi Energy. Hitachi Energy offers technology leadership backed by a proven record of addressing diverse challenges and improving standards. Our product portfolio is the result of research, manufacturing, and servicing transformers, making us unique in the industry. Hitachi Energy's combined solutions for rolling stock are fully tested for precision and operations before dispatch.
We offer standard prices and quick delivery times for the products listed in Our Railway Portfolio. If necessary, our engineers can also provide customized solutions for your application.

Hitachi Energy offers a comprehensive portfolio of rail transformers to meet our customers' evolving needs. We can bundle multiple accessories together so that transformer manufacturers can focus on delivering to their customers on time and without hassle.
